metadata.title: CVE-2024-41123 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
REXML is an XML toolkit for Ruby. The REXML gem before 3.3.2 has some DoSvulnerabilities when it parses an XML that has many specific characterssuch as whitespace character, `>]` and `]>`. The REXML gem 3.3.3 or laterinclude the patches to fix these vulnerabilities.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-41123` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby3.0 - 3.0.2-7ubuntu2.8
ruby3.0 - 3.0.2-7ubuntu2.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby3.0 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.2-7ubuntu2.8').
